title: Indian Summer
description: Set in a near future, a time where robots are common workers for their owners. Takaya Murase has just purchased a maid robot from a robotic doll distriubutor, MaidWorks. Ready to live a normal cleaning, cooking, and serving life to her owner, Yui is purchased, by Takaya but he has other plans for her...like dressing her up in dress-costumes of his fantasies and more.

episodes.title: Don't Look At Me Like I'm a Pig / I Can't Take This Any More / My Breasts Don't Produce Milk
I'm a Leftover After All / F... Fire from Between the Legs! / Men's Wild Solo Activities...
Big Sister... Huh? / My Important... / It's an Indian Summer
